name: AIPerformanceDashboard
title: AI Performance Dashboard
description: Comprehensive dashboard for analyzing AI agent and prompt performance with time-series charts, cost analysis, and drill-down capabilities
functionalRequirements:
## AI Performance Dashboard Requirements

### Core Functionality
- Display multi-line time series charts showing total runs, tokens, and costs over time
- Support multiple time groupings: day, week, month, quarter
- Dual Y-axis display (tokens on left, runs/costs on right)
- Click-to-drill-down on any chart point to see details for that period
- Show distribution charts (pie/bar) for selected time period
- Separate tabs for Agent Runs and Prompt Runs analysis
- Real-time data refresh capabilities
- Export functionality for charts and data

### Analytics Features
- Time series trends with moving averages
- Cost breakdown by agent/prompt
- Token usage distribution
- Success/failure rate analysis
- Performance comparisons across periods
- Top consumers identification
- Anomaly detection and alerts

### UX Considerations
- Responsive layout adapting to container size
- Interactive tooltips on hover
- Smooth chart animations
- Loading states during data fetch
- Clear visual hierarchy
- Consistent color coding across charts
- Mobile-responsive design

dataRequirements.description: Loads AI performance data including agent runs, prompt runs, and aggregated metrics

entities.name: MJ: AI Agent Runs
entities.description: Historical agent execution data for performance analysis

entities.name: MJ: AI Prompt Runs
entities.description: Historical prompt execution data for performance analysis

technicalDesign:
## Component Architecture

### Root Component (AIPerformanceDashboard)
- Manages overall dashboard state and data loading
- Handles time range selection and grouping
- Coordinates drill-down state between components
- Manages tab switching between Agent and Prompt views

### Child Components
1. **AITimeSeriesChart**: Multi-line chart with dual Y-axes for runs/tokens/costs
2. **AIDistributionChart**: Pie/bar charts showing breakdown by agent or prompt
3. **AIDetailTable**: Detailed table view for drill-down data
4. **AIMetricsSummary**: Key metrics cards for selected period

### Data Flow
- Root component loads data based on selected time range
- Aggregates data by selected grouping (day/week/month/quarter)
- Passes aggregated data to chart components
- Handles drill-down events and updates detail views
- Manages state persistence through savedUserSettings

### State Management
- Selected time range and grouping
- Active tab (agents vs prompts)
- Drill-down selection (selected date/period)
- Chart view preferences
- Filter states

dependencies.name: AITimeSeriesChart
dependencies.title: AI Time Series Chart
dependencies.description: Multi-line time series chart with dual Y-axes showing AI runs, token usage, and costs over time
dependencies.functionalRequirements:
## Time Series Chart Requirements

### Core Functionality
- Display three data series: total runs, total tokens, total cost
- Dual Y-axis configuration (left: tokens, right: runs and cost)
- Interactive tooltips showing all values on hover
- Click on data points to trigger drill-down
- Smooth line interpolation with data point markers
- Legend with series toggle capability

### Visual Features
- Different colors for each series
- Hover effects on data points
- Animated transitions
- Responsive sizing
- Grid lines for readability

dataRequirements.description: Receives aggregated data from parent component

dependencies.technicalDesign:
## Technical Design

### Props
- data: Array of aggregated data points
- groupBy: Time grouping (day/week/month/quarter)
- activeTab: Current view context (agents/prompts)
- selectedPoint: Currently selected data point
- onPointClick: Callback for drill-down

### Chart Implementation
- SVG-based rendering for performance
- Custom scales for dual Y-axes
- D3-style data binding
- Synchronized tooltips across series

properties.name: data
properties.description: Array of aggregated time series data

properties.name: groupBy
properties.description: Time grouping: day, week, month, quarter

properties.name: onPointClick
properties.description: Callback when data point is clicked

events.name: onPointClick
events.description: Fired when user clicks on a data point
events.payload: { date: string, runs: number, tokens: number, cost: number, items: array }

dependencies.name: AIDistributionChart
dependencies.title: AI Distribution Chart
dependencies.description: Pie and bar charts showing distribution of runs, tokens, and costs by agent or prompt for drill-down analysis
dependencies.functionalRequirements:
## Distribution Chart Requirements

### Core Functionality
- Display distribution breakdown for selected time period
- Toggle between pie chart and bar chart views
- Show top 10 items with 'Others' grouping
- Display runs, tokens, and cost metrics
- Interactive tooltips with detailed values
- Color-coded segments with legend

### Visual Features
- Smooth transitions between chart types
- Hover effects on segments
- Click to filter/highlight
- Responsive sizing
- Data labels for major segments

dataRequirements.description: Receives drill-down data from parent component

dependencies.technicalDesign:
## Technical Design

### Props
- data: Array of individual run records
- activeTab: Current view context (agents/prompts)
- groupBy: Time grouping context

### Chart Implementation
- Aggregates data by agent/prompt
- Calculates percentages
- Sorts by total value
- Groups small items into 'Others' category

properties.name: data
properties.description: Array of run records to analyze

dependencies.name: AIDetailTable
dependencies.title: AI Detail Table
dependencies.description: Detailed table view showing individual runs for drill-down analysis with sorting and filtering
dependencies.functionalRequirements:
## Detail Table Requirements

### Core Functionality
- Display individual run records in a sortable table
- Show key fields: timestamp, name, success status, tokens, cost, execution time
- Color-coded success/failure indicators
- Sortable columns with visual indicators
- Paginated results for large datasets
- Export to CSV functionality
- Expandable rows for additional details

### Table Features
- Responsive column widths
- Hover row highlighting
- Sticky header during scroll
- Loading state for data updates
- Empty state message

dataRequirements.description: Receives detailed run data from parent component

dependencies.technicalDesign:
## Technical Design

### Props
- data: Array of run records
- activeTab: Current view context (agents/prompts)

### Table Management
- Client-side sorting
- Pagination with 25 rows per page
- Column sorting state management
- Row expansion for details

dependencies.name: AIMetricsSummary
dependencies.title: AI Metrics Summary
dependencies.description: Summary cards displaying key performance metrics for the selected time period
dependencies.functionalRequirements:
## Metrics Summary Requirements

### Core Functionality
- Display key metrics in card format
- Show total runs, tokens, and costs
- Calculate averages per run
- Display success rate percentage
- Show trend indicators
- Responsive card layout

### Visual Features
- Icon for each metric
- Color-coded values
- Hover effects
- Smooth animations
- Responsive grid

dataRequirements.description: Receives calculated metrics from parent component

dependencies.technicalDesign:
## Technical Design

### Props
- metrics: Object with calculated metric values

### Display
- Responsive grid of metric cards
- Each card shows metric name, value, and icon
- Consistent styling with theme
